item.title: ‚úÇÔ∏è snips.sh retrospective: 1000+ stars later
item.description:
Finally released https://t.co/GEAONuN7Mt üéâ

Need to upload a code snippet?

echo "something" | ssh https://t.co/GEAONuN7Mt

It's a free, anonymous, open source, snippet hosting service pic.twitter.com/u2hUvl9gRO

— Rob Herley (@robherley) May 12, 2023

# What the snip?

A tad bit over a year ago, I released https://snips.sh, a passwordless, anonymous SSH-powered pastebin with a human-friendly TUI and web UI. No logins, no passwords, nothing to install. It’s ready-to-go on any machine that has SSH installed.
